members.joinCircumstances: Law freed Jean Bart from slavery by removing his explosive collar, and Jean Bart accepted Law's invitation to join the crew to escape the Celestial Dragons.

keyMoments.title: Jean Bart Joins the Heart Pirates
keyMoments.description: After being freed from slavery by Trafalgar Law, Jean Bart accepts the invitation to join the Heart Pirates, becoming a new member of the crew.
keyMoments.significance: Adds a powerful former pirate captain to Law's crew and demonstrates Law's compassion and willingness to stand against the Celestial Dragons.

keyMoments.title: Heart Pirates Battle Marines
keyMoments.description: The Heart Pirates join forces with the Straw Hat Pirates and Kid Pirates to fight the Marines surrounding the Human Auctioning House.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases the Heart Pirates' combat abilities and their cooperation with other Supernova crews.

keyMoments.title: Heart Pirates Encounter Pacifista
keyMoments.description: The Heart Pirates encounter a mysterious figure that looks like Bartholomew Kuma, which begins attacking them with laser beams. Law mistakes it for the real Warlord.
keyMoments.significance: First encounter with a Pacifista for the Heart Pirates, introducing them to the World Government's advanced weapons.

ships.description: The Heart Pirates' submarine, though not shown in this episode.

jollyRoger.description: A skull with a fur hat resembling Law's hat and crossed swords behind it, with a smiley face design

keyMoments.title: Kid Pirates Battle Marines
keyMoments.description: The Kid Pirates join the battle against Marines outside the Human Auctioning House, with Kid demonstrating his Punk Gibson technique.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases the Kid Pirates' power and their willingness to cooperate with other Supernova crews when necessary.

keyMoments.title: Kid Pirates Promise to Meet in New World
keyMoments.description: Kid and his crew part ways with the Straw Hats and Heart Pirates, promising to meet again in the New World as rivals.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the competitive dynamic between the three Supernova crews heading to the New World.

keyMoments.title: Kid Pirates Encounter Pacifista
keyMoments.description: The Kid Pirates encounter a mysterious figure resembling Bartholomew Kuma that attacks them with laser beams.
keyMoments.significance: First encounter with a Pacifista for the Kid Pirates, introducing a major threat.

jollyRoger.description: A skull with Kid's distinctive spiked hair pattern

name.japanese: 人生バラ色ライダーズ

keyMoments.title: Rosy Life Riders Help Straw Hats Escape
keyMoments.description: Duval and the Rosy Life Riders arrive with their flying fish mounts to help the Straw Hat Pirates escape from Sabaody Archipelago after the battle at the auction house.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the value of the alliance between the Straw Hats and Rosy Life Riders, with Duval honoring his friendship with the crew.

jollyRoger.description: A skull with Duval's handsome face design
